scripts.build:icon: tsc && vite -c config/icon.js build && rm src/static/icon.iife.js && mv dist/js/icon.iife.js src/static/
scripts.build:rte: tsc && vite -c config/rte.js build && rm src/static/rte.iife.js && mv dist/js/rte.iife.js src/static/
scripts.build:chart: tsc && vite -c config/chart.js build && rm src/static/chart.iife.js && mv dist/js/chart.iife.js src/static/
scripts.utils-alc:minify: echo "input=$(jq -sRr @uri dist/css/utilities.txt)" | curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded" -T - "https://www.toptal.com/developers/cssminifier/api/raw" -o dist/css/utilities.min.css
scripts.build:utilities-alc: npm run utils-alc:extract && npm run utils-alc:merge && npm run utils-alc:minify && rm dist/css/utilities.txt
